customer said hi can we put it in the steam sterilizer after washing. agent said hi rouweida thanks for reaching out when it comes to our avent products you can sterilize all parts except silicone tubes caps motor and adapter in a philips avent steam sterilizer or by boiling them for minutes make sure to allow for a cooldown period after the sterilizing cycle has ended the breast pump can be too hot to touch immediately after sterilizing however if you are using the electric breast pump there is no need to sterilize the silicone tubes and caps as the milk is not in contact you should not clean the motor unit and adapter in water but wipe clean with a soft damp cloth hope this answers your question if you still need assistance were here for you

customer asked how long does it take to cook in the air fryer. agent said hi glynis thanks for leaving your question using the grill pan accessory place the pan in the airfryer set the temperature to degrees and bake for minutes we preheat the airfryer at a higher temperature so that it is nice and hot when the meringue goes in stopping it from running switch off the airfryer after the cooking time but leave it shut leave the meringue in the warm airfryer for minutes then remove from the airfryer and leave to cool let us know if we can give you more tips

agent said hi gary thanks for reaching out to us regarding your experience of electric shavers we are sorry to hear that so far it has not been great what a shame we recommend new users of a philips shavers to keep in mind that the skin needs to adapt to the electric razor this means that the skin may feel slightly irritated in the beginning so its best to allow yourself an adjustment period of two to three weeks with a new philips shaver also only apply a gentle pressure which makes your facial hair stand upright and makes it easier for the shaver blades to catch and cut them feel free to contact us if you ever need help with a philips shaver we here and always happy to help

customer said does it work on dark skin. agent said hi nilz thanks for your questions regarding thw lumea the philips lumea ipl series is effective on a wide range of hair and skin types it works on naturally dark blonde brown and black hair and on skin tones from very white to dark brown ipl needs contrast between the pigment in the hair colour and the pigment in the skin tone therefore as with other iplbased treatments philips lumea ipl cannot be used to treat white grey light blonde or red hair it is also not suitable for very dark skin we hope this helps

customer said is this suitable for the dark skins. agent said hi we hope that all is well with you this is a common question that is frequently asked unfortunately the lumea doesnt have an effect on dark skin tones the lumea emits flashes of light heat to the skin in order to impact the hair from the roots but in dark skin tones it is not possible because of the melanin in the skin the melanin prevents the flashes of light from entering the skin rendering the lumea useless it was a pleasure helping you better understand our product if you have any other questions please feel free to contact us we are always here for you have a nice day sheldon lquipe philips

customer asked bobotie what is that i guess this product is not meant for me. agent said hi there bobotie is a wellknown south african dish consisting of spiced minced meat baked with an eggbased topping very delicious however the allinone cooker is for all you can make a variety of your favourite dishes including one like mogodu beef stews etc. customer said at least you resisted the urge to call it south africas national dish smh

customer said can you put distilled vinegar or distilled water into the decalc chamber. agent said hello there thanks for your question here we recommend not to use ironing water perfumed water or any other commercially available water that contains vinegar chemicals or descaling agents your steam iron or garment steamer has been designed to be used with tap water however if you live in an area with hard water fast scale buildup may occur therefore to prolong the lifespan of your iron or steamer it is recommended to use distilled or demineralized water demineralized water mixed with tap water could be used too hope this helps
